item.description: Reviews and ratings are everywhere. But are reviews consistent with ratings?

item.title: Briefly: a tweakable text summarizer
item.description: This is an easy-to-use multilingual text summarizer with a command line and a web interface. It lets you experiment with text summarization.

item.description: We look at two contrasting case studies.
